TopicTitle: What is that pink indicator on the far left, that doesn’t allow me to fly correctly?

Articles.Content: There is a pink indicator in all of the three axis of movement (pitch, roll, yaw), that moves as it like tries to correct me, but doesn’t allow me to fly manually, how can I get rid of it?
Do you have any sort of autopilot mods installed?
You have the trim set, you must turn it off or it will cause problems.
Screenshot of what you mean might help, plus any mods you are using.
On the consoles for version 1.2.2 there is an extra set of pink Roll/Pitch/Yaw indicators for trim, if it is set.

11 hours ago, bewing said:

On the consoles for version 1.2.2 there is an extra set of pink Roll/Pitch/Yaw indicators for trim, if it is set.

 

In that case you'll want the console equivalent of Alt-X to reset trim to neutral.
